comment: If you need replace rules, artist or copyright, place this file into TSSSF/translation.json and/or TSSSF/card_set_name/translation.json and edit it

RulesDict.{replace}: While in your hand, you may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied.
RulesDict.{copy}: You may copy the power of any Pony card currently on the shipping grid, except for Changelings.
